alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Hopkins; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:26PM CDT until June 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hopkins County in north central Texas... Delta County in north central Texas... Lamar County in north central Texas... Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1025 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Roxton to near Wolfe City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Sulphur Springs, Bonham, Leonard, Cooper, Honey Grove, Blossom, Savoy, Cumby, Como, Ector, Roxton, Trenton, Dodd City, Ravenna, Lake Bonham, Valley Lake, Cooper Lake, Randolph and Lake Sulphur Springs. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 110 and 142. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
